title: Future Macs could feature UWB, making them easier to fine-locate
content:
Apple first introduced the ultra-wideband (UWB) chip back in late 2019 when it released the iPhone 11 lineup. It then made its way to Apple Watches, HomePod Mini, and AirTags. The post Future Macs could feature UWB, making them easier to fine-locate appeared first on xda-developers.
description: macOS Monterey 12.3 beta hints that future Macs might include the ultra-wideband (UWB) chip, which could make fine-locating them possible.
